actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 3402 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (relating to income tax collected at source), to provide $20 billion in immediate tax relief by reducing the amount of tax withheld.

summary.text: Withholding Tax Relief Tax Act - Revise the withholding tables under the Internal Revenue Code with respect to income tax collected at the source to generally lower the amounts initially withheld.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3402 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (relating to income tax collected at source), to provide $20 billion in immediate tax relief by reducing the amount of tax withheld.
